channel.title: FLF - Dead Men Walking Podcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: The Baptist-Terian Christmas Special! With: Greg Moore, Claude Ramsey, Keith Foskey, Joel Webbon, Kevin Hay, Andrew Rappaport, C.R. Wiley, A.D. Robles, & Davis Younts [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description: Welcome to the first annual Baptist-Terian Christmas! Whos says Baptists and Presbyterians can't get along? This livestream was hosted by Greg Moore, Claude Ramsey, and Keith Foskey! We had guests stopping by all hour including: C.R. Wiley, Joel Webbon, Andrew Rappaport, Kevin Hay, Davis Younts, and A.D. Robles. We discussed best Christmas traditions, worst Christmas gifts, Keith Foskey's suspicious candle collection, Joel Webbon's personal style, along with some theology mixed in and many other fun topics. Enjoy
item.author: Greg Moore, Claude Ramsey, Keith Foskey, Joel Webbon, Kevin Hay, Andrew Rappaport, C.R. Wiley, A.D. Robles, & Davis Younts
item.itunes:author: Greg Moore, Claude Ramsey, Keith Foskey, Joel Webbon, Kevin Hay, Andrew Rappaport, C.R. Wiley, A.D. Robles, & Davis Younts

item.title: The Politics of Professional Sports with Jon Root #DMW200 [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description:
This week Greg sat down with Jon Root. Jon root has worked in professional sports broadcasting for over a decade. Greg & Jon opened with how they met through an internet controversy, then discussed the politics of sports, how wokeism has invaded that landscape, if playing and being a sports fan as a believer is a worthwhile endeavor, and how christians are to interact with sports media. Jon also sat in on a "Fresh 10" segment, and we got to get to know him a little more. It was a fun episode to record. Enjoy!

 

Support the show and check out our snarky merch: http://www.dmwpodcast.com
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC
